channel.title: [PI] Drop Rates and Drops
channel.description:
Okay, last night I had the code exactly like this.
#Man drops 1:1 526:1 995:3
and it dropped 1 set of bones and 3 coins EVERY man kill, now today it won't drop the bones AT ALL. Not sure why, any ideas?

item.title: [PI] Drop Rates and Drops
item.dc:creator: @Tyler_Hostility Tyler_Hostility
item.description:
@Tyler_Hostility wrote:

Where is the drop rate file located? I’ve searched my source thoroughly and cannot find it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Drop Rates and Drops
item.dc:creator: @lugmfr lugmfr
item.description:
@lugmfr wrote:

[quote=“Tyler_Hostility, post:1, topic:419347”]Okay, last night I had the code exactly like this.

#Man drops
1:1 526:1
995:3

and it dropped 1 set of bones and 3 coins EVERY man kill, now today it won’t drop the bones AT ALL. Not sure why, any ideas?[/quote]

Because that has nothing to do with drop rates, it’s what item it drops and how many of that item it drops. Theres two files, one for what item and how many it drops and the other one for the rates of the item which is dropped, look over it again.

Read full topic
